00027 const int skXMLParseException_Code=5;

00032 class CLASSEXPORT skXMLParseException : public skException
00033 {
00034  public:
00036   skXMLParseException (const skString& error,int line_num): m_Error(error),m_LineNum(line_num) {}
00038   int getLineNum() const { return m_LineNum; }
00040   skString getErrorMessage() const { return m_Error; }
00041   skString getMessage() const { return m_Error; }
00042   skString toString() const { return m_Error; }
00043  private:

00045   skString m_Error;
00046 };
